title: Alpine Linux: CVE-2025-5245: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
title_translated: Alpine Linux: CVE-2025-5245: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
summary: A critical vulnerability in GNU Binutils up to version 2.44 allows for memory corruption through the debug_type_samep function in objdump. Local access is required for exploitation, and a patch is recommended to mitigate the risk.

title: Alpine Linux: CVE-2025-5244: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
title_translated: Alpine Linux: CVE-2025-5244: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
summary: A critical vulnerability in GNU Binutils up to version 2.44 allows for improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer, leading to memory corruption. The exploit requires local access and has been publicly disclosed, making it a significant risk. Upgrading to version 2.45 is recommended to mitigate this issue.

title: 谷歌Chrome紧急发布ANGLE高危补丁，人工智能安全研究员Big Sleep发现零日漏洞（CVE-2025-9478）
title_translated: Google Chrome has urgently released a high-risk patch for ANGLE. AI security researcher Big Sleep discovered a zero-day vulnerability (CVE-2025-9478).
summary: Google has released a critical security update for Chrome to address a vulnerability in the ANGLE graphics engine, discovered by its AI agent Big Sleep. This vulnerability poses a significant risk as it could be exploited by attackers, highlighting the importance of proactive AI-driven security measures.

title: Citrix NetScaler曝零日漏洞（CVE-2023-6548）黑客正利用RCE漏洞发动攻击
title_translated: Citrix NetScaler has a zero-day vulnerability (CVE-2023-6548) being exploited by hackers to launch attacks using Remote Code Execution (RCE).
summary: Multiple high-risk vulnerabilities in NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway could lead to remote code execution and denial of service attacks. CVE-2025-7775 is actively exploited, prompting immediate upgrades for affected versions. Secure Private Access deployments are also impacted.

title: CISA紧急警告：Git代码执行漏洞正遭黑客利用
title_translated: CISA issues urgent warning: Hackers exploiting Git code execution vulnerability.
summary: A remote code execution vulnerability in Git allows attackers to exploit mishandled carriage returns in configuration files, leading to arbitrary code execution when victims clone repositories. This high-risk vulnerability has been added to CISA's KEV catalog, requiring federal agencies to patch it by September 15.

title: Citrix Session Recording Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
title_translated: Citrix Session Recording Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
summary: CVE-2024-8069 is a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability in Citrix Session Recording that allows limited remote code execution with NetworkService Account privileges. An attacker must be an authenticated user on the same intranet as the session recording server to exploit this vulnerability. Mitigations are advised per vendor instructions.

title: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and macOS Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
title_translated: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and macOS Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
summary: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and macOS have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the Image I/O framework that could allow attackers to exploit the system. Users are advised to apply mitigations as per vendor instructions or discontinue use if mitigations are unavailable.
